org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.assoc

Class AssociationModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.mooc.nonpers.assoc.AssociationModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Shareable
public class AssociationModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An association rule model, storing item-item association scores.

    You should note need to change this class. It has some internal optimizations to reduce the memory requirements after the model is built.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssociationModel

        public AssociationModel(java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,? extends java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double>> assocScores)
        Construct a new association model.
        Parameters:
        assocScores - The association scores. The outer map's keys are the X items, and the inner map's keys are the Y items. So assocScores.get(x).get(y) should return the score for y with respect to x.

    • Method Detail

      • getKnownItems

        public it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongSet getKnownItems()
        Get the set of known items.
        Returns:
        The set of known item IDs.

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem(long item)
        Query whether the model knows about an item.
        Parameters:
        item - The item ID.
        Returns:
        true if the model knows about the item item, false otherwise.

      • getItemAssociation

        public double getItemAssociation(long ref,
                                 long item)
        Get the association between two items.
        Parameters:
        ref - The reference item (X).
        item - The item to score (Y).
        Returns:
        The score between X and Y.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either item is invalid.
